name: Car Flight Simulator Unlimited
description:
Do you love Flying Car Games? Want to fly your sports car like an airplane? This Game is perfect for you!
You can test your airplane pilot skills and car driving ability at the same time.
Drive your car through endless asphalt roads between rocks and mountains. Open your robot wings to transform into a flying car, discover new landscapes, Accelerate your sports car do stunts and drifts ! Burn the asphalt road ! Be the fastest car driver!
You are free in a world that you can do what you want!

Flying Car Driving Simulator Airplane Flight Pilot is made for all fans of flying car games, Simulation games and Airplane Flight games


"Flying Jet" and "Drift" vehicles requires in-app purchase.
developers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
